catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is NiO-In2O3/TiO2.
co_catalyst: The text does not explicitly state a co-catalyst used in the experiment, but mentions NiO and In2O3 loaded onto TiO2 as components of the catalyst. These could be considered co-catalysts.
reaction medium: The experiment was conducted in the gas phase, utilizing gases like helium (He), carbon dioxide (CO2), hydrogen (H2), and water vapor (H2O).
